about_us_description: The company 'IntellectWork' entered the Georgian market in 2021. We offer fully automated and integrated software development and services using modern technologies on much more favorable terms compared to market prices. Our highly qualified professional staff has created many successfulproducts for ecommerce applications and in the field of mobile applicationsWe also have experience in setting up and introduction of other multi-profile systems, ensuring the best possible quality of the product we offer for the success of your business.
our_product_description: Our team of highly qualified professionals offers the creation of automated systems such as: online shopping, mobile shopping, cargo transportation web and mobile application, transportationservice application, tracking application, development of individual and business websites.
first_question: How much costs creation of web page ?
first_answer: Price of web page depends on its technical and business requirements, our analyst can help you creating these requirements.
second_question: How much time need for creation middle level online shopping?
second_answer: Our team has created platform of online shopping which gives you opportunity to run online shopping in short term, with fully integration of your inhouse systems.
third_question: What kind of services are you suggesting?
third_answer: We will help in integration and testing our systems with monthly support.
